Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: G. Green
Reviews.Content: Only complaint is the battery life, and sometimes texting can lag a bit otherwise it's good.  The size is perfect not too large or small.

Reviews.Title: LG ESCAPE 4G ANDROID PHONE.
Reviews.Author: Sharon Garrigan
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with our purchase.we get excellent reception, unlike our old phone. Has all the features we were looking for and more. The price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone ever
Reviews.Author: O. Webb "Old Dog"
Reviews.Content: First I must say, that Ross Cellular is a great company, they sold me a great phone.  They have my very deep thanks.  The phone is great for a new comer to smart phones.  Just be sure to check with your carrier, in my case they had to download their patch for the phone before I could use their data service.  The price was right and I am having a ball.  Thanks again to Ross Cellular.

Reviews.Title: Good phone , great price
Reviews.Author: GSuiter "gsuiter"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our sons birthday.  Its a great phone for him, he loves it.  Good battery life, and he has it doing things I never even knew a phone could do  haha....Hes only 10, so we didnt want to spend a lot of money on a first phone, but this was a better phone than I expected..

Reviews.Title: Great phone for first smartphone users...
Reviews.Author: Zhazgul
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as a gift for my dad, who was really frustrated using smartphones. However he found this phone more comfortable. He loves it what makes me happy with my choice.This phone works great...No issues, so smooth...

Reviews.Title: LG ESCAPE 4G UNLOCKED CELL PHONE
Reviews.Author: S. Selph
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone as a replacement for my husband. He was using an HTC cell phone that was very difficult for other people to understand him on. Not sure what the problem was! He has used this one for a week or so and seems to be very happy with it. Set up was easy. The only issue was, we had to order a smaller SIM card from AT&T.; This phone uses a  much smaller card than the HTC. You can get one from your carrier if needed for free.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: WIL MAY
Reviews.Content: Phone is excellent entry into Smart Phone models for those of us not particularly adept in this field, works quite well.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad choice
Reviews.Author: Alicia Bacock
Reviews.Content: I have only had this item 3 days but have used it the way I need a ph and have had no issues that other ph caused i.e. freezing, slow connections, slow typing, slow screen switching. I do not play music on  my phones so I cannot commentl, but I did download two apps and both completed nicely. This ph is light, thin and have only needed to charge it once a day. But it wasnt completely drained. I still had 30% battery. The tabs next to search window makes it convenient to switch screens. And it is great to hit a button only once and get a response. No more stabbing ph!! One more thing..someone posted link to show APN codes. I wrote them down. Im glad my ph carrier gave me codes without asking. The posted link was incorrect. Please ask your carrier.  Enjoy your ph..I am.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: JACQUELINE SIMPSON
Reviews.Content: Great phone. It was a Christmas gift for my daughter, she loves it! Prompt shipment,dispite bad weather in some areas. :)
